properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 2:46PM PST until January 10 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.
- GENERAL SEAS...7 to 8 ft through Friday morning then building
to 10 to 12 ft.

- FIRST EBB...Very strong ebb around 345 PM Thursday. Seas near
11 ft with breakers possible.

- SECOND EBB...Around 415 AM Friday. Seas near 13 ft.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...For the first Small Craft Advisory, until 5 PM PST this
afternoon. For the second Small Craft Advisory, from 2 AM to 7
PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft especially
when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY
